# US-001: Test User Story

**Priority**: P1  
**Status**: Active  
**Epic**: [EP-001: Test Epic](../epic-001.md)

## Description

As a test user,  
I want to perform test actions,  
So that I can validate test functionality.

## Acceptance Criteria

- **AC-US1-01**: When user performs action, then system responds correctly
- **AC-US1-02**: Given test state, when event occurs, then expected outcome happens
- **AC-US1-03**: System handles edge cases gracefully

## Tasks

- [ ] **T-001**: Implement test functionality
- [ ] **T-002**: Add test validation
- [ ] **T-003**: Write test documentation

## Implementation

See: `.specweave/increments/0001-test-feature/`
